description.value: The path maiden targets a creature within 60 feet that she can see. The target must attempt a Will save against the path maiden's spell DC. On a failure, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] until the end of its next turn, but it can't attack path maidens or itself as the result of this confusion.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
